name: Fiction
descr: Books that contain imaginary or made-up stories

name: Non-Fiction
descr: Books based on factual information or real events

name: Science Fiction
descr: Stories based on futuristic concepts or advanced technology

name: Fantasy
descr: Books featuring magical or supernatural elements

name: Adventure
descr: Exciting tales of exploration and daring feats

name: Mystery
descr: Books centered around solving crimes or uncovering secrets

name: Biography
descr: Books detailing the life of an individual

name: Science
descr: Books explaining scientific concepts and discoveries

name: Self-Help
descr: Guides aimed at improving personal growth and life skills
